I brought the game today yay!

While playing around with the spaceplane hanger, i had an idea.

A 2 stage spaceplane, The first stage would have the engines and fuel to get the plane up into the air (not space) and once a good altitude is reached, the power stage is ejected and lands safely via parachutes, once ejected, the second stage can be a balanced, easy to fly glider, with no power of its own. The challenge is to carefully glide it back down and land it without parachutes.

Anybody want to have a go at building this? I\'ve tried but as i\'m new to the game i just can\'t quite make balanced aircraft yet lol
